actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Education Department; OMB.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts, and Humanities

official_title: A bill to reinstate the provisions relating to parental involvement in chapter 1 of the Education Consolidation and Improvement Act of 1981 relating to financial assistance to meet special educational needs of disadvantaged children.

summary.text: Amends the Education Consolidation and Improvement Act of 1981 to require the Secretary of Education to base payments of assistance to local education agency programs for special educational needs of disadvantaged children on the amounts of grants as determined under specified provisions of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act concerning parental involvement.

titles.title: A bill to reinstate the provisions relating to parental involvement in chapter 1 of the Education Consolidation and Improvement Act of 1981 relating to financial assistance to meet special educational needs of disadvantaged children.
